text: I'd like to have a struct for every line I find in a text file.
(So yeah, basically I want to define my struct, then count lines, and fill up my structs.
But I'm always lost in Python.
(Sorry for the lame question, hope other newbies (like me) will find it useful.
Of course, feel free to edit the question (title) to reflect the real thing.
